titleStmt.title: Pharmaceutice rationalis: or, An exercitation of the operations of medicines in humane bodies. Shewing the signs, causes, and cures of most distempers incident thereunto. : In two parts. : As also a treatise of the scurvy and the several sorts thereof, with their symptoms, causes, and cure. / By Tho. Willis ...
titleStmt.author: Willis, Thomas, 1621-1675.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for T. Dring, C. Harper, and J. Leigh in Fleetstreet: and are to be sold by R. Clavell at the Peacock, at the west end of St. Paul's:,

notesStmt.note: Published under same title in Latin in 1675.
The second part has separate t.p. and paging.
Item at reel 2183:2 incorrectly identified as Wing W2848A.
Reproductions of original in the Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: the Peacock, at the west end of St. Paul's
